project.name: Google APIs Client Library for Java

build.plugins:
org.apache.maven.plugins maven-resources-plugin
resources
maven-javadoc-plugin
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/ https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/standard/java/javadoc/ https://cloud.google.com/java/docs/reference/google-http-client/${project.http.version}/ https://cloud.google.com/java/docs/reference/google-oauth-client/${project.oauth.version}/
${project.name} ${project.version} ${project.artifactId} ${project.version}
maven-jar-plugin
${project.build.outputDirectory}/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF
true
google.api.client
${project.return.to.the.real.project.owner}/META-INF/MANIFEST.>>
https://developers.google.com/api-client-library/java/ The Google API Client Library for Java provides functionality common to all Google APIs; HTTP, handling, JSON parsing, media download/upload, and batching.
source-jar </>
<com.google.code.gson
